author: gartung
body: This patch to the downloaded gprc repo allows protoc to be called when it depends on LD_LIBRARY_PATH being set. For some reason it was unset when protoc was called in the grpc plugin gen step on a SLF7 machine at Fermilab. The same step has LD_LIBRARY_PATH set when running in the cmsBuild environment. This was the only fix the worked. I though I should pass it along.
title: Update to make grpc_plugin code gen work
